long_description: The Louis Garneau Knee Warmers are a favorite among seasoned cyclists for their lighweight warmth and smart design. Nylon and spandex fabric moves effortlessly with you; brushed interior offers moisture-wicking and insulating properties. Flatlock seam construction is soft and non-chafing next to skin. Thigh grippers keeps warmers snugly in place; when the day warms up, warmers pack away easily. Fabric provides UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. The Louis Garneau Knee Warmers have reflective logos to increase your visibility to motorists in low light.
short_description: The Louis Garneau Knee Warmers are a favorite among seasoned cyclists for their lighweight warmth and smart design.
